twoSetSkill.name: Trailing Comet 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Fireworks explosions ignite enemies, dealing 100 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 5s. Attacks against ignited enemies gain 15% Fire DMG. This effect cannot stack.

threeSetSkill.name: Powderful 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Fireworks Launcher deals an additional 20% Fire DMG. Launcher also unleashes a powerful explosion when it disappears, dealing 300% ATK of Fire DMG to enemies in a large AOE and stunning them for 4s.
